channel.title: Version 5.7 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 5.7.0 (2022-11-29) Change Change Th' Korean language translat'n fer this theme be now avail'ble wit' th' language code ko. Formerly th' country code kr was used instead. New New Th' button shortcode can now also be used as a real button inside o' HTML forms - although this be a pretty rare use case. Th' documentat'n was updated accordingly.
